name: toptal-coding-test-prep
description: Practice environment for Toptal 120-minute coding test preparation

scripts.test:mock1: echo 'Running Mock Test 1...' && cd day3/mock-test-1 && node problem-1.js && node problem-2.js && node problem-3.js
scripts.test:mock2: echo 'Running Mock Test 2...' && cd day3/mock-test-2 && node problem-1.js && node problem-2.js && node problem-3.js
scripts.test:mock3: echo 'Running Mock Test 3...' && cd day3/mock-test-3 && node problem-1.js && node problem-2.js && node problem-3.js
scripts.test:all-mocks: npm run test:mock1 && npm run test:mock2 && npm run test:mock3
scripts.solutions:mock1: echo 'Running Mock Test 1 Solutions...' && cd day3/mock-test-1/solutions && node problem-1-solution.js && node problem-2-solution.js && node problem-3-solution.js
scripts.solutions:mock2: echo 'Running Mock Test 2 Solutions...' && cd day3/mock-test-2/solutions && node problem-1-solution.js && node problem-2-solution.js && node problem-3-solution.js
scripts.solutions:mock3: echo 'Running Mock Test 3 Solutions...' && cd day3/mock-test-3/solutions && node problem-1-solution.js && node problem-2-solution.js && node problem-3-solution.js

author: Sandeep Amarnath
